@synapse101 I was thin until I went into hospital in 2010 for severe depression (and again in 2011), as the medication puts weight on. It is what it is. At least I am feeling better, even with extra weight. Depression never goes away, but I'm coping. #FuckTheHaters
@colonelhogans Bother because you are important. I suffer depression and we need to talk about it. Not for sympathy, but to bring awareness to it.

@jfitzgeraldMD Over 3 years I was treated for severe depression when in fact I was menopausal. 3 hospital stays, antidepressants, going crazy. An intern referred me to Dr for women‚Äôs health who put me on HRT. 3 years of hell that could have been avoided if symptoms taken seriously.

@BecWrong I've lost 10kgs in a year. Wasn't on a diet. My doc has run a million tests & there's no reason she can find. I do walk the dog everyday but not that much to lose that weight. She puts it down to my major depression disorder  & fibromyalgia cond I have. I'm still worried.
